name: Pathways & Partnerships - Burton High
description: Bayview Y provides job readiness training and WBL experiences through Burton's Pathway Program. They train teachers in job readiness curriculum to develop career ready skills and improve social/emotional learning to benefit 10th-12th graders. The team collaborates with Burton staff to provide job readiness training, develop WBL opportunities, train and support employers, monitor student progress and link students to additional support services as needed. They support broad implementation of best
